appTitle: MEcfs-PAPERwork - ALPHA version (please report bugs on GitHub.)
appSubtitle: Paperwork for Myalgic Encephalomyelitis (ME/CFS) made easy. Secure in your browser - all data stays on your device.
feedbackIntro: Please do not include any patient or health data.
shareCopyInstructions: Copy the link below to share it.
shareCopiedDescription: The link has been copied to the clipboard.
formpackListDescription: Here you can see the currently available support offers. More are in progress. If you want to help, get in touch.
formpackListEmpty: No support offers are available yet.
formpackListErrorFallback: Support offers could not be loaded right now.
formpackLoadError: This support offer could not be loaded right now.
formpackNotFound: This support offer was not found.
formpackUnsupported: This support offer uses a language that is not supported yet.
formpackInvalid: This support offer manifest is invalid.
formpackSchemaNotFound: The support offer schema file is missing.
formpackSchemaInvalid: The support offer schema file is invalid.
formpackSchemaUnavailable: The support offer schema could not be loaded.
formpackUiSchemaNotFound: The support offer UI schema file is missing.
formpackUiSchemaInvalid: The support offer UI schema file is invalid.
formpackUiSchemaUnavailable: The support offer UI schema could not be loaded.
formpackDocxErrorUnterminatedFor: DOCX template: A FOR loop is missing a matching END-FOR.
formpackDocxErrorIncompleteIf: DOCX template: An IF block is missing a matching END-IF.
formpackDocxErrorInvalidSyntax: DOCX template: The template syntax is invalid.
formpackDocxErrorInvalidCommand: DOCX template: A command is invalid or not properly closed.
formpackFormNoActiveRecord: Select or create a draft to start entering data.
formpackRecordDeleteConfirm: Delete draft "{{title}}"? This cannot be undone.
formpackImportHint: Select a JSON export file to restore a draft.
formpackImportModeOverwriteHint: Select an active draft to enable overwrite.
formpackSnapshotsNoRecord: Select or create a draft to manage snapshots.
formpackSnapshotsClearAllConfirm: Delete all snapshots for this draft? This cannot be undone.
importSchemaMismatch: The data does not match the schema.
importInvalidPayload: The import data is incomplete or invalid.
importFormpackMismatch: This JSON belongs to a different formpack.
importInvalidRevisions: Snapshots in the JSON export are invalid.
importUnsupportedLocale: The export uses an unsupported language.
importNoActiveRecord: Select an active draft before overwriting.
importOverwriteConfirm: The active draft will be overwritten. Do you want to continue?
importStorageError: Import could not be saved. Please try again.
storageUnavailable: Local storage is not available in this browser.
storageError: Could not access local storage. Please try again.
